channel.title: Cut on useful snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Cut on useful snippets

item.title: adding weight history to Garmin Connect (in bulk)
item.description: Garmin Connect can now import csv files from FitBit. This means that I can upload my old records of my weight to Garmin without having to enter each one manually. It will be nice to see everything I’ve recorded in Connect and on the app.
